extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: ʻAuto skip ads when watching YouTube videos. Let YouTube no ads!

timesaveInfo.message: Ua mālama ʻia ʻo VAB-YT ma kahi o. $SavedTime$ o kou ola ana.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: E hōʻike i ka ʻike hoʻonui ma lalo o ka wikiō

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Hōʻike i nā noi i ālai ʻia i helu ʻia ma ka hōʻailona

helpUsWithAReview.message: E kōkua mai iā mākou me ka loiloi
